author: Paulina Cachero
title: WHO investigates reports of recovered coronavirus patients testing positive again
description: On Friday, South Korea reported that 91 coronavirus patients being considered for discharge tested positive for the virus again. The director of the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said the virus may have been "reactivated" rather than the pa…
content:
The World Health Organization (WHO) announced Saturday that it is investigating reports that coronavirus patients who initially tested negative tested positive for the virus days later. 
"We are aware of these reports of individuals who have tested negative … [+3264 chars]
